brand.name: Arambhika Enablers
brand.tagline: Nickel & Copper Battery Connectors — Mfg. & Dist.

solutions.title: What Sets Us Apart in Battery Components
solutions.subtitle: Speed, scale, and reliability — built in-house.

items.title: Fully In-House Manufacturing
items.line: End-to-end in-house manufacturing with an integrated plating plant and capacity up to 25 tonnes per month.

items.title: Emergency Production Support
items.line: Dedicated production support to meet emergency and urgent customer requirements without delays.

items.title: Rapid Custom Development
items.line: No tooling charges and ultra-fast custom product development with lead times under 7 days.

items.title: Trusted Industry Partner
items.line: Proven track record serving leading energy brands.

about.title: Our Key Strengths & Capabilities
about.lead: We believe the above strengths enable us to deliver consistent quality.
whyItems: Production support during emergency and urgent requirements.
Complete in-house setup of all machineries along with an integrated plating plant.
No tooling cost charged for running / repeat products.
Very low development lead time, enabling faster product finalization.
Proven experience in catering to reputed brands, public listed companies, etc.

contactCta.title: Reach our team for pricing, samples, and supply planning.
contactCta.lead: Visit the Contact Us page to send your requirements and get a response within 24 hours.

capabilities.title: Manufacturing units built for precision and scale.
capabilities.lead: Tooling, slitting, stamping, and quality checks aligned to battery pack requirements.

cards.title: Precision Slitting
cards.text: Consistent width control with clean edges for stable welding.

cards.title: Custom Stamping
cards.text: Tabs, holes, and bends tailored to your pack design.

cards.title: Surface Finish
cards.text: Bright, matte, or brushed finishes with inspection reports.

cards.title: Bulk Logistics
cards.text: Flexible MOQ, bulk reels, and repeatable deliveries.
